name: Krishun Hudson
text: The staff and manager are always very friendly and keeps a smile on their faces. Always feel welcome everytime. Also, the food is always made with fresh ingredients and always on time. If anyone does have a problem, they take care of and your issues with no hesitation. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo Al is absolutely the best. We love our Hut!!!

name: Otis Geystan
text: I try my best to give Pizza Hut my service but every time there is a problem. My food showed up cold because as the driver said “Someone didn’t put the wings in the bag with the pizza, so he had to go back to the store to get them”. After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

name: Christian Buckner
text: No masks, requested curbside and waited 10 min before going inside as no employees were looking outside. Not busy. Food was great.

name: Courtney Baugh
text: I have attempted to give this location so many chances. Literally the worst Pizza Hut I have used. This last time I ordered delivery and got a call that their delivery guy didn’t show and it would be 3 before they had a driver. Mind you this whole call the lady was so rude about the situation. I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

name: Jazzy L
text: The staff is rude especially the people who work on the phones. My pizza and pasta is always dry carry out or delivery. They don’t have their curbside pickup sign up. -12/10 on customer service. -50/100 for food quality.

name: Kristy Edwards
text: I did curb side pick up. I called when I got there and they told me it would be two minutes. I waited 15 minutes before trying to call again. No one answered so I got out and went in and my food had been sitting in the warmer the whole time. This store is understaffed. The food was delicious but the service was bad.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Susie Smith
text: This location does an awesome job!  The delivery driver was nice and the pizza was great.

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Squeakyyr 4 Brown
text: None of the employees wore gloves or mask...

name: Erick Shields
text: Great atmosphere and very affable service. The meals were crisp and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and large portions. Great job.

name: Harold Hickman
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for convenient rates. Always clean and with fantastic character. Will visit here again.

name: Shawn Romanstine
text: Ordered online 2 medium speciality and recv 1 cheese and 1 sausage but was charged for speciality. The person working said I got what I ordered. Ok but why did I pay for what I didn't get? The 2nd time in a row my order was wrong!!! Now to the top!

name: Kolton Buck
text: I simply like their food. I always get great customer service there. The place is clean and the staff members are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time

name: keepcoolalive
text: Pretty sure I’ve gotten sick the last two times I’ve eaten here. Completely strengthened my fear of getting food from anywhere other than MY kitchen.

name: sonido pachuko king
text: Terrible service, they don't know how to place an order and rude manager has NO professionalism

name: Zac Copeland
text: Can't ever get instructions right, such as a regular Dr.Pepper not a Diet, can't seem to remember to put the garlic crust flavor on a stuffed crust pizza, brought a sierra mist the other day when asked for Mt. Dew. Its the simple things really.

name: Stephanie Thacker
text: Absurd service! Waited over an hour AFTER the pizza was out for delivery. They forgot our drink. When we called, the manager was rude and wouldn’t contact the delivery driver to bring one. So we asked just to be credited the couple dollars for it. They charged my card without asking an extra $10 because it “changed the special” without the drink that THEY forgot. So I paid $49 for 2 cold pizzas. I’ll stick to papa Johns from now on.

name: s8vy15
text: Went in earlier today and placed an order for our youth football team. We ordered 6 pizzas and stressed they needed to be delievered there at a certain time and was told they would be. Called for 15 minutes to FINALLY have the actual store answer to tell us our order was still sitting in the store at the time they were SUPPOSED to be delivered and waiting on a driver. Really this was PRE ORDERED!!!  This is ridiculous the way their service is.

name: Randy Hatcher
text: Ordered pizza got home only half toppings on it plus IT WAS burnt so bad it was black no sauce on it at all call up there talked to TOM the manager and was told I have to drive back 15 mins 1 way to fix there problem and the guy told me oh well it is what it is. Ya never again will i do business with them.

name: Deanna Davenport
text: Terrible service. Ordered a simple pizza over the phone, got to business after 30 mins and they had my number saved and NO pizza. Had to "reorder" and still tried to charge full price with no apologies of the long wait!

name: Michael Patton
text:
Mobile app wouldn't let me cancel a double-clicked order which would have cost 10.90.  Called and they got light sauce confused with extra sauce.  The cost was 12.46.  Got home to a pizza I didn't eat but two bites of.

I won't ever order via phone again.  Hope the app works better someday.

name: Corey Baginski
text:
Had been ordering delivery from here for quite a while. Called in my order tonight and was told they didn't have any delivery drivers. On a Saturday night. There must be something wrong with either what they pay, or whoever answered the phone didn't give a $#!+.
Please remove the delivery option from your website.
Thank you, Domino's, for delivering.

name: Joey Icolano
text: Love the new location!  Fast friendly service.  Great value from the $5 Flavor Menu

name: Whit Russell
text: This place is been doing very good pizza in town for a very long time. They moved to a new location a couple of years ago, but it's the same franchise.

name: Robin Simmons
text: I enjoyed the convenience of ordering online. Pizza hut in Montevallo did a wonderful job. The service was great and the food was delicious!

name: R B
text: Ordered three pizzas, all three were over cooked, all three pizzas were not cut all the way through and very difficult to cut. I had my elderly father pick up the pizza due me being ill and needing to feed the kids. My dad didn’t look at the pizza or didn’t realize how over cooked it was and he had no way of knowing about the pizzas not being cut through. Regardless it should have not been served to customers. I called to address the issue the manger did not apologize once, in fact he sounded like he didn’t care at all. He just offered a credit for one pizza. I was suppose to have a credit from their last mess up, but didn’t push it and wanted to give them another try when placing the order. Whoever is in charge at the moment is doing a terrible job.

name: Mustang Concepts
text:
Worst EVER!!! Ordered pizza, waited 101 minutes for said pizza to arrive. Needless to say the pies  resembled cardboard wheels with cheese. As for the bread sticks, well they would have served a better purpose as rubber chew toys for the pooch!! I called the store and waited 27 minutes to speak to a manager, only to have the phone hung up by some over achieving pizza clerk who didn't even bother to check if someone was on the line. HELLOOOOOOO!!!!!!!.
YOU CANT FIX STUPID and for a college town, there sure are a LOT of IGNORANT people here!!!

name: Kathy Hughes
text: Pizza is soggy. Has large chunks of green peppers.The cinnamon bread is good and the delivery drive was nice.

name: Taylor Coe
text: Terrible. Used to work there and it’s only gone downhill. Had a two and a half hour wait for just wings and fries. Would have picked it up but the woman on the phone claimed my number didn’t work. I don’t even like the pizza, but the wings are much better than Dominoes.

name: Dinki Wheeler
text: Good service hot food just the calzones had barely any meat or cheese

name: Mary Bullard
text: Tonight was awful. Ordered a BBQ beef pizza and got delivered a pizza with bbq sauce an cheese. Called back up there an was put on hold because they were cleaning up. So.i pulled up at 9:58 an they were supposed to close at 10.. sorry but yall bout to make me the correct pizza. The manager Tracy was very rude she was from the prattville pizza hut.

text: If zero/negative stars was an option that’s what they’d get

PIZZA HUT IS AWEFULL.
THE PRICE GOES UP AND THE AMOUNT OF TOPPINGS GOES DOWN.
WE ORDER HALF EVERYTHING AND THERE IS BARELY ANYTHING

GO TO JENNY CAN COOK AND FIND HER PIZZA CRUST RECIEPE   IT IS FAST AND DELISH
ANYTHING IS BETTER THAN THIS POS PIZZA PLACE

name: s8vy15
text: Went in earlier today and placed an order for our youth football team. We ordered 6 pizzas and stressed they needed to be delievered there at a certain time and was told they would be. Called for 15 minutes to FINALLY have the actual store answer to tell us our order was still sitting in the store at the time they were SUPPOSED to be delivered and waiting on a driver. Really this was PRE ORDERED!!!  This is ridiculous the way their service is.

name: Randy Hatcher
text: Ordered pizza got home only half toppings on it plus IT WAS burnt so bad it was black no sauce on it at all call up there talked to TOM the manager and was told I have to drive back 15 mins 1 way to fix there problem and the guy told me oh well it is what it is. Ya never again will i do business with them.

name: Deanna Davenport
text: Terrible service. Ordered a simple pizza over the phone, got to business after 30 mins and they had my number saved and NO pizza. Had to "reorder" and still tried to charge full price with no apologies of the long wait!

name: Michael Patton
text:
Mobile app wouldn't let me cancel a double-clicked order which would have cost 10.90.  Called and they got light sauce confused with extra sauce.  The cost was 12.46.  Got home to a pizza I didn't eat but two bites of.

I won't ever order via phone again.  Hope the app works better someday.

name: Corey Baginski
text:
Had been ordering delivery from here for quite a while. Called in my order tonight and was told they didn't have any delivery drivers. On a Saturday night. There must be something wrong with either what they pay, or whoever answered the phone didn't give a $#!+.
Please remove the delivery option from your website.
Thank you, Domino's, for delivering.

name: Joey Icolano
text: Love the new location!  Fast friendly service.  Great value from the $5 Flavor Menu

name: Whit Russell
text: This place is been doing very good pizza in town for a very long time. They moved to a new location a couple of years ago, but it's the same franchise.

name: Robin Simmons
text: I enjoyed the convenience of ordering online. Pizza hut in Montevallo did a wonderful job. The service was great and the food was delicious!

name: R B
text: Ordered three pizzas, all three were over cooked, all three pizzas were not cut all the way through and very difficult to cut. I had my elderly father pick up the pizza due me being ill and needing to feed the kids. My dad didn’t look at the pizza or didn’t realize how over cooked it was and he had no way of knowing about the pizzas not being cut through. Regardless it should have not been served to customers. I called to address the issue the manger did not apologize once, in fact he sounded like he didn’t care at all. He just offered a credit for one pizza. I was suppose to have a credit from their last mess up, but didn’t push it and wanted to give them another try when placing the order. Whoever is in charge at the moment is doing a terrible job.

name: Mustang Concepts
text:
Worst EVER!!! Ordered pizza, waited 101 minutes for said pizza to arrive. Needless to say the pies  resembled cardboard wheels with cheese. As for the bread sticks, well they would have served a better purpose as rubber chew toys for the pooch!! I called the store and waited 27 minutes to speak to a manager, only to have the phone hung up by some over achieving pizza clerk who didn't even bother to check if someone was on the line. HELLOOOOOOO!!!!!!!.
YOU CANT FIX STUPID and for a college town, there sure are a LOT of IGNORANT people here!!!

name: Kathy Hughes
text: Pizza is soggy. Has large chunks of green peppers.The cinnamon bread is good and the delivery drive was nice.

name: Taylor Coe
text: Terrible. Used to work there and it’s only gone downhill. Had a two and a half hour wait for just wings and fries. Would have picked it up but the woman on the phone claimed my number didn’t work. I don’t even like the pizza, but the wings are much better than Dominoes.

name: Dinki Wheeler
text: Good service hot food just the calzones had barely any meat or cheese

text: Pk

name: Krishun Hudson
text: The staff and manager are always very friendly and keeps a smile on their faces. Always feel welcome everytime. Also, the food is always made with fresh ingredients and always on time. If anyone does have a problem, they take care of and your issues with no hesitation. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo Al is absolutely the best. We love our Hut!!!

name: Otis Geystan
text: I try my best to give Pizza Hut my service but every time there is a problem. My food showed up cold because as the driver said “Someone didn’t put the wings in the bag with the pizza, so he had to go back to the store to get them”. After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

name: Christian Buckner
text: No masks, requested curbside and waited 10 min before going inside as no employees were looking outside. Not busy. Food was great.

name: Courtney Baugh
text: I have attempted to give this location so many chances. Literally the worst Pizza Hut I have used. This last time I ordered delivery and got a call that their delivery guy didn’t show and it would be 3 before they had a driver. Mind you this whole call the lady was so rude about the situation. I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

name: Jazzy L
text: The staff is rude especially the people who work on the phones. My pizza and pasta is always dry carry out or delivery. They don’t have their curbside pickup sign up. -12/10 on customer service. -50/100 for food quality.

name: Kristy Edwards
text: I did curb side pick up. I called when I got there and they told me it would be two minutes. I waited 15 minutes before trying to call again. No one answered so I got out and went in and my food had been sitting in the warmer the whole time. This store is understaffed. The food was delicious but the service was bad.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

text: None of the employees wore gloves or mask...

name: Erick Shields
text: Great atmosphere and very affable service. The meals were crisp and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and large portions. Great job.

name: Harold Hickman
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for convenient rates. Always clean and with fantastic character. Will visit here again.

name: Shawn Romanstine
text: Ordered online 2 medium speciality and recv 1 cheese and 1 sausage but was charged for speciality. The person working said I got what I ordered. Ok but why did I pay for what I didn't get? The 2nd time in a row my order was wrong!!! Now to the top!

name: Kolton Buck
text: I simply like their food. I always get great customer service there. The place is clean and the staff members are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time

name: keepcoolalive
text: Pretty sure I’ve gotten sick the last two times I’ve eaten here. Completely strengthened my fear of getting food from anywhere other than MY kitchen.

name: sonido pachuko king
text: Terrible service, they don't know how to place an order and rude manager has NO professionalism

name: Zac Copeland
text: Can't ever get instructions right, such as a regular Dr.Pepper not a Diet, can't seem to remember to put the garlic crust flavor on a stuffed crust pizza, brought a sierra mist the other day when asked for Mt. Dew. Its the simple things really.

text: Absurd service! Waited over an hour AFTER the pizza was out for delivery. They forgot our drink. When we called, the manager was rude and wouldn’t contact the delivery driver to bring one. So we asked just to be credited the couple dollars for it. They charged my card without asking an extra $10 because it “changed the special” without the drink that THEY forgot. So I paid $49 for 2 cold pizzas. I’ll stick to papa Johns from now on.

text: Great food and great service. I haven't had any issues. Consistently hot, fresh, delicious food.

name: Jason Gilbert
text: Go get a frozen pizza instead, don't waste your money at this dominos.The only good thing about this place is when it's closed.

name: Matt St. John
text: We have repeatedly had problems with this particular store.  Tonight, we tried calling from various phones for over an hour.  They didn't even bother to answer.  I would hate to know that I was too lazy or ignorant to know how to answer a phone call at a business that offers delivery.  This is the WORST dominos we have ever dealt with and we won't bother with them again.

name: Matt Qualls
text: Best costumer service ever!! Have yet to be disappointed all around!

name: Eric Wilson
text: The best buffalo chicken pizzas ever.

name: Brad Bell
text: Awesome store with great service

name: Leslie Little
text: As a first time customer, I was very pleased with my online order. The food was freshly prepared and was ready at the stated time. I was impressed that it was still hot when we arrived home. I would love to see at least one other option for sides besides fries, otherwise, I have no complaints.  I will be a returning customer.

name: Glorious Living
text: Everything I've eaten here has always been fresh. I'm never disappointed with anything I've tried from here.

name: Tiffany Bowie
text: It was ok not bad they can use better customer service. By me being in customer service I know what to expect and theirs is not good at all. Was something to try and eat since it was close to home. Won’t come here anymore.

name: Jenniferl Ramos
text: We had the wet lemon pepper wings and cheese fries. They were super busy, but our food came out quickly, hot and really good! The wings were pretty small especially for the price, but overall very tasty. Because of the wing size, I probably would not come back. They are right next to Papa Murphy’s however and  we are suckers for our traditional Friday night pizza and wings!

name: Dusty Finch
text: Kings wings better value ,I've had bigger chicken nuggets

name: Superior Grooming
text: Best wings in Jefferson county! They small though so get extra

name: Tanika Lyons
text: The food was delicious. One of the best philly steaks I’ve had. The wings were small but they were good and cooked just right.

name: Honey
text: The wings were small, horrible, and bloody; with a foul smell.  I started to go back in there, but I decided not to because I did not want them to redo another batch.  I gave them a try, but that is it for me.

name: Christopher Morgan
text: Great food and service, we finally have a legit wing spot in heuytown 👍👏

name: City Boy
text: First time here and it was awesome. Will deffinately be back!

name: Sugelewis
text: Can't go in

name: Call Me RaeeBan
text: Dry lemon pepper wings with cheese fries was the blandest thing I ever had .

name: Tracy Ellis
text: Loved it

name: Sharita
text: Great food, great service !!!!

name: M. Cottrell
text: Delicious!!!

name: Curt Granger
text: Great restaurant and great service. Other reviews said "worst pizza"?? I don't know what they ordered, but Papa Saia's ALWAYS serves up a great pizza for me. Their Supreme pizza is LOADED with toppings (enough for two pizzas), and I always end up bringing some home, reheat the next day, and have another meal from it. The All Meat pizza is great too. And yes, I've had Slice, Davenports, Dave's, and Tortuga's, so I am very familiar with pizza in Birmingham, thank you.

name: Sheryl Strickland
text: Very nice! Sitting on the patio listening to a guy playing the guitar & watching the beautiful waterfall is just an amazing setting!! Food is great!! 😆

name: Ben Lawson
text: Always a good time to sit outside and look at the waterfall. The service is usually great and friendly. Down home atmosphere where you can have fun.

name: David Farris
text: If you love wings and love pizza, you definitely need to try their wing pizza. My wife and I always order a large so we have left overs. Also their gooey fries are awesome, they're not your typical cheese fries.

name: Lynnette Burton
text: Could not sit on the patio because the music was so loud that you would have to scream to be heard.  This is not a club, it is a sports bar.  Wings were very good.  They were sold out of oysters.  Bathroom had no handtowels.  Waitress vigorously swept the carpet at the front door while we sat 5 feet away with a table full of food.  The doors and windows were open creating the breeze that was carrying all the dust from the sweeping right into our faces and our food.  I cannot believe that this was my choice for a night out.  Will never go back

name: Josh Buchanan
text: Great place to visit and we always love sitting outside near the waterfall. The wait staff is friendly but they always seem to mess our order up in some way. Its no big deal but its the only thing keeping them from a perfect score.

name: Hewy NoSleep
text: Great location with Tiki deck and a view of the waterfalls. At night, the falls are lite up by the city. During lunch they have a great meat and three menu. Also a great location for Football games in the bar are and deck.

name: W Price
text: Good wings and great pizza.  Nice option for seating by the Cahaba River's Buck Creek dam in Old Town Helena.  Friendly staff, plenty of TVs for game day watching.  Good happy hour & daily beer prices.

name: Beau Helton
text: Blind hostesses estimated a 20 minute wait when there were two open tables outside before giving us the table directly in front of the entertainer's speaker. The wings were dry, and the onion rings were fried too long and were greasy.

name: Life Is Brewtiful
text: Good food, good food prices. Beer selection is ok but a lil expensive for bottle prices. I enjoy the patio and it's waterfall view. Staff was accommodating

name: Lou Latham
text: Undoubtedly the worst pizza I have ever eaten.  It appeared the crust with sauce was cooked in advance and then toppings added to order later.  In my case, much later.  Ordered the supreme.  The toppings looked as though they had never seen the inside of an oven.  The bell pepper was raw and the mushrooms and pineapple were out a can.  Won't be back.

name: Scott Smith
text: Good atmosphere.  Deck overlooks the creek.  Live music outside.  Great drink selection.

name: Dee Clark
text: Family friendly place. Smoking allowed on the deck. Baby changing stations in both men's and women's restrooms. Food was okay

name: Alan Floyd
text: This is my place during football season. I love them more since adding fried Wickles to their menu. I'll give them a five star when they finally get started carrying my favorite beer (Hoegaarden). ;)

name: Dill Weed
text:
My 3 experiences here have left me just "okay" at best. I certainly would not recommend sitting inside, under any circumstances. There's a bar, pool table, and benches, but the entire restaurant smells like smoke (and trash), so sit outside.

Which leads me to the good part. They have a nice outdoor deck, right next to the water, plenty of trees, so for sitting somewhere outside during good weather, this place is perfect for just kicking back a few brewskies and chatting with friends outside.

Calzones are too expensive, but they are good and you can totally share one with your wife.

They do have music outside/inside a few times a week, usually a 1 person guitar act.

name: Mary Ann Stephens
text: Very disappointed with service and food last night.  After waiting an hour to get our food and restaurant not full.  Our order was a total disaster.  Our appetizer came out with order which is a pet peeve of mine.  Jalapeno peppers were asked to be put on the side and they were all over it.  My boyfriend ordered a meat pizza and jalapeno peppers were put all over it and all the waitress said was I'm sorry and offered no resolution.

name: Tina Olive
text: I came for the first time today for the crawfish boil. The crawfish had a good taste but were overcooked and tough. About 10 of the crawfish didn't have tail. I also bought crab claws thinking they were boiled but they were fried. I also told them I didn't want the sides it came with and they didn't change the price.

name: Ray Uzun
text: Good food and perfect for families! The back patio has views of the water

name: Gene Horton
text: Moved back to original location in Alabaster. I live in Alabaster, so this is FABULOUS!

name: Julia Peart
text: Love their food and eating on the patio is a must....

name: Leland Smith
text: Awesome burger and brew. Would be 5, but they allow smoking.

name: Tom Pappas
text: Great pizza and service.

name: Karen Boolos
text: Love this place! Hate they are moving!

name: Eric Godsey
text: Restaurant half empty on a fri night but still 30 min wait!? Clearly poor planning and not enough help. Going to the competition instead.

name: Edwin Leal
text: Good local bar

name: kelby godwin
text: The food is good

name: Tony Padgett
text: Great wings!

name: Kandi Shaw
text: My fish was over fried or microwaved!! What is going on? It was so dried it cracked when i bit into it! Didnt get even a hint of  fish.  Im so disappointed.

name: demetrius gilmore
text: Great food not so great service

name: Bettina Stoutmire McGhee
text: Wings were great

name: Tom Lawery
text: Good food..

name: Maxine Bailey
text: Never been in there- drive by it often.

name: Burnette Plumbing
text: Great customer service

name: Michelle Williams
text: It ok

name: carlos cruz
text: They don’t listen to the customers and mess up orders every single time. I hate having to repeat myself constantly but it seems they make a sport of it.

name: nadia billings
text: It's a good place to grab some food that tastes great. The staff is very polite and greets you at the door, my experiences have always been great. Some of the staff have even memorized my boyfriend and my usual go to choices when we come in.

name: rashad montgomery
text: This place is either hit or miss. Very inconsistent. One day it is good and the next it is bad. Drinks are minimal. The basic selection. 9 dollars for all you can eat. Not too bad.

name: Art Of Valor
text: Cozy little place on campus. Very convenient and the service is great!

name: K REID
text: No bathroom available food is kinda pricey and condiments are extra and the wait times are horrible

name: Whitney Weiss
text: High prices, meh food. Just eat at the cafe.

name: Trips Riley
text: Amazing!!!!

name: Colin Tomblin
text: Finally a decent wing place in NW Huntsville! Rookiez is conveniently located in Monrovia across from the elementary school. The wings and fries were both served hot and fresh. There are several sauces to choose from for the wings as well as many different topping options for the fries. We got the ranch and cheese on the fries and it did not disappoint! I definitely recommend calling your order in ahead of time and checking it for accuracy before leaving. The prep time was a good 20-30 minutes. There is  some seating inside. When we went there were limited drink options: canned Dr. Pepper or the house punch.

name: Jeff Rayfield
text: Not an impressive interior, but the food is really good. Next door is a well known bbq restaurant that causes traffic jams, they could use some of that traffic. The wings we had were really good.

name: Rachelle Griffin

She just doesn't seem to care.  My co-workers empathize and have decided to discontinue eating here.

name: James “XDMAN” Nicholas
text:
Yard Birds Chicken Company keeps getting better and better. They changed the menu yesterday and added cheese grits and bottomless Chicken & waffles everyday! I love chicken and waffles, but the portion was big enough that I could only eat one waffle, crispy fried breast and wing. To the owner you are a man of your word when you said you would fix the problems. We have been back a 4th and 5th time and every thing was fantastic!

2nd visit maybe I just have bad luck, Stood at the door for several minutes with my wife. They were not busy and we even asked an employee if we could just sit. Someone will be with you. I want to like this place but....... a simple hey we see you would help. I would actually rate it lower but the fried chicken is good and that got them an extra star. 1st visit Ate lunch at Yard Birds Chicken Company. Today was the grand opening so I will forgive them for forgetting the jalapeño cornbread then giving me biscuits and having to ask for ranch multiple times. The chicken was excellent, They use a crumbly crust almost like you use on fried green tomatoes. And It almost seems like they smoke the chicken first then batter and fry. It was tasty and next time I will have to have the hot. Now for the bad the corn bread was cold, not just room temp but cold. If it was warm then man it would have been great. As a suggestion please please add a honey butter with the warm cornbread or biscuits and it would be perfection.

name: Chastity Webb
text: Went on a Tuesday around lunch. It wasn’t busy as there were only about 4 other tables. Waitress was nice but service was slow. Menu advertises steak fries, we received potato wedges. Not sure is that is a typo on the menu or a stock issue as their collard greens were also out of stock that day. Wouldn’t care to visit again.

name: Justin Williams
text: Went Friday night, the place had a nice crowd. Sat at the bar and ordered right away. Bartender was very nice and talkative. Food was great! Need to cook the potato wedges just a hair longer though. Will definitely be back to try the wings another day.

name: Nick Pearson
text: Best Chicken you can get in Trussville. I have eaten in twice and done Take-Out twice. Never had a bad experience and food always tastes amazing. The portions are huge and prices are just right! If you haven't tried it yet I suggest you do so!

name: Linsey Honeycutt
text: My husband and I went to Yard Birds today to try the "bottomless chicken and waffles " It was delicious! The service was great and The chicken was freshly fried and hot when delivered. He ordered the original waffle. I ordered the chocolate chip waffle. Huge portions! No way we could do seconds! We had get a to go box for our first round!! We also ordered a bourbon pecan pie to go. We have not tried it yet, but it's beautiful in its box and smells amazing! We will be back!!!

name: Katy Gibson
text: Stopped in for the weekend brunch of ENDLESS chicken n waffles ($10 each), So good! The staff was friendly and helpful. Try it you'll love it. Plus the restaurant donates a part of their profits to military and first responders.

name: Peggy Cox
text: We visited the new Yard Birds Chicken in Trussville last evening. Very nice experience. Very clean, very friendly and very good food. Prices are reasonable and service is excellent. A nice, relaxing dinner. Absolutely the best Mac and cheese I've ever had!

name: Joanna Nicholas
text: We decided to try this place again a few nights ago. I got the bourbon Sriracha popcorn chicken. It was amazing and there was more than enough for leftovers. I ate it again the next day and it was even better. We ate there again today & it was wonderful again. Service was nice and quick. I'm so glad this place worked out it's growing pains & had turned into a decent place to have lunch or dinner.

name: K Mixon
text: It was just okay.  I got the smoked chicken and it had no flavor.  The grits were extremely runny and the collard greens were not good.  The macaroni and cheese had an unique taste that my daughter did not like.  I would have given this place one star but the severs were so nice and extremely helpful.

name: Anthony Riley
text: The food was great, it deserves five stars. The service was ok, it did take a little while for our order but it wasn't too long. The only drawback for me were the prices which I thought were a little high. I will have to try here again in the near future, the food was worth the trip.

name: Mary Libb
text: Just had the best fried chicken, fried green tomatoes and homemade pimento cheese at Yardbirds. The atmosphere, servers and music were also great. Will definitely be back soon!!

name: Lauren Washington
text: First time here, service started out a little slow, but our server Alexis made up for that, she was very friendly and provided great service. I really would like to give this place 3.5 starts just because it's not quite 4. Chicken was fried well, and breast was juicy and not dry, the crust had great flavor but the meat itself didn't have much flavor, chicken should be marinated or brined to give the meat some flavor. Whole fried okra was very good. Macaroni cheese was soupy with hardly any cheese flavor, they should revamp that recipe, collard greens were like they had been sitting all day they were over cooked. My family liked the waffles. I would give it another try to try some of the other sides. I think with a few changes this place would be a go to place.

name: Halen Talley
text: Very good. I think this would be a good place to come on a Football Saturday.

text: Chicken was cold and tasteless. Mac and cheese was not good but did enjoy the fried green tomatoes. Also, they forgot the cornbread/buscuit.

text: We went in to get food and after the person I was with paid for her food I noticed that the entire staff, including those fixing the food did NOT have on gloves or masks. I even noticed a female in the kitchen, around the food cleaning out her nails. I’ve been here before and the food was good but right now there’s a virus and there should be better precautions when preparing the food. I begged my sister to get a refund but she wouldn’t and just ordered from another vendor that was wearing protective gear.  Definitely not a good look.

text: Really Great Food. I lover their Philly's and their cheese fries. I also love their Western Burger. They have great customer service and are very polite.

text: My wife and I stopped in for a bite to eat before our way home. This was our first time trying this establishment as we wanted something different to eat besides the usual. I can tell you this was our first and last time eating here. My wife ordered some wings that were half done. When she took them back to get a refund, she was told they don't do refunds on wings.... 🤔🤔🤔. Wait.... If the only thing u don't do refunds on are wings that must mean that you have a lot of complaints on wings. The only thing good about our visit was the teenager that took our order, he was professional unlike the manager.

name: Subs And More
text: I just want to clarify something. If you look at the timing of these reviews you will see that all the bad ones talking about bugs and other things are within a few minutes or hours of each other. This is because an employee who threw a temper tantrum and walked out decided to seek revenge on our business by having all of her little minions post bad reviews. Our health score speaks for itself. None of these people posting in the last day or so have ever even BEEN to our restaurant. Please ignore the childish behavior of these people.

text:
Worst experience ever
I've waited around for almost an hour n still didn't get my order. So I've just got my money back. There was another person waiting for fries. He even said how long does it take to cook fris. I won't suggest this place to anyone if asked. The ladies up front weren't bad.  But they were saying they are short handed today

I know it's under new ownership because I've known Bernardo for a long time and had never any kind of issue.

name: Anna Surlo
text: Since subs and more shows lack of professionalism I will as well. I lived in dothan al all my life I have been to the mall every saturday since i was in seventh grade i ate at that place more times than i can count and I've recieved food poisoning twice I'm not a minion but if youd like I'll place a call to the better business bureau and report you for attacking people who post bad reviews online and I'll call the health department while I'm at it now if you have a problem with it feel free to contact me on facebook but good luck finding me. Hope you get shut down have a nice day🖕

name: Coalson Lee
text:
We stopped here on our way home. I’ve never tried it until then but I can say I never will again! Atleast not this location!!
First and for most the employees were arguing in front of customers when I first walked in.
Second, my food tastes HORRIBLE! Like the refrigeration wasn’t running very well on where they keep the meats. Third, whip I was eating the sandwich I send a FREAKING ROACH CRAWLING ON THE WALL.
I tried to get the manager but she was “busy”, all the employee would tell me is her name was ranni ? I tried to call her after we left to inform her of our stop and hopefully get these situations explained and fixed! Never got a call back.

name: Duncan Mills
text:
Honestly it just all around sucked.

The line/checkout was confusing, I did not know where to pay or wait for my food. My sub wasn’t made right in front of me like literally every other sub sandwich place. They got it served through the window then I got asked “what you want?” And they peel open your sandwich to add ingredients.

The food, albeit edible for a hungry shift worker, was pretty sad. All I wanted was a normal BLT sub sandwich with mayo, and some chips. Instead, I got served this weird but sad triple-decker pressed Texas toast BLT. I didn’t mind the non traditional approach, but the execution was bad. The Texas toast was smashed so thin I had this dense layer of mayonaise soaked bread to peel off my teeth. The bacon was cooked well but the lack of lettuce, tomato, and a normal sub bun kinda ruined it.

At least it was cheap, around $7.50, so at least it wasn’t an expensive mistake.

name: Jay Myers
text: Had lunch there last week. Very helpful staff, and food was GREAT! Prices were less that I expected too.

name: Dawn Marsh
text: If I could give less than one star I would. There's roaches crawling around and gnats swarming the food. 1the food is awful. Don't bother wasting your time.

name: Joshua Scott
text: Owners are terrible after complaining about the wrong order the owner come and harassed my wife and I at our table!

name: Chase R
text: Dont bother wasting your time or money. Got the philly cheese steak that was 15 dollars with a fry and drink which was pathetic for that type of money. Low quality ingredients, hardly any meat on it and a bland taste and as someone else said, luke warm soggy fries that had been sitting out for who knows how long. You would think for being a "Sub" shop a philly cheese steak would be a strong point but I was sadly mistaken. If you want a better meal for a better price I'd advise you taking your money anywhere else but here.

name: Abigail Davenport
text: I work in the mall. I go here all of the time. But today was unacceptable. Walked up to order a sweet tea at 9:28. Not until 9:36 did the blonde manager come out and tell me "they're open, just not serving". Online hours say they're open at 9am. I told her I only need a sweet tea, and she told me "we're not serving". So thank you, for wasting almost 10 minutes of my break just to then not allow me to purchase a simple sweet tea. I'll take my business to chick fil a.

name: Matt Pollard

I came back in at 7:00 PM waited ten minutes to be helped, then told it would be another ten minutes till the pizza arrived. It is currently now almost an hour since we told it would be ready and at 8:00 PM it would be two hours since we ordered. I would not and I mean absolutely would not recommend this place!

text: Great service! A big shout out to Jennifer and the rest of the crew for being so fast, friendly and courteous. Vernon, Alabama has by far the best Pizza Hut we have ever eaten at. The toppings taste fresh and and the staff go above and beyond. Thanks again for another great supper!

text: I was supposed to take a picture before I ate it... 😓 But it was perfect fresh out of the oven. 🤤... My review: I messed my order up, my online receipt said I messed  my order up... I was going to take the "not my favorite pizza" but the guy who was working offered to fix it. 🤯 Was not expecting that especially since it was my fault and I didn't make a big deal about it. He said he wanted me happy. 🤯 I always get good service and pizza from this location and always end happy. I don't know his name I'm assuming he's the manager as I always see him working late. The last time he helped me was a year ago, when we talked about their wings being fried, and we agreed that baked soggy wings are the worst. I was impressed he took the time out to talk to me and explain their products when he was busy. A year later he's still great and helped me tonight. I felt compelled to leave a review and tip better next time. I took this opportunity to point out to my wife that this was why I tip even if I'm just picking up pizza.

text: When I place a delivery order it always take two hours if not longer. When it gets here the pizza is freezing like the driver has been driving around. This place is horrible. Dominos is the best!

name: Brannan Kramer
text: Unacceptable Experience: Placed online order for delivery at 6:16P.M. on a Monday and didn't receive order until 8:26P.M. I called to ask about my order at 7:55P.M. and was told that they were out of the Meaty Marinara pasta I had ordered. They replaced my order and delivered my food to me. I understand busy evenings and being cripplingly short staffed. I worked a pizza place for years. What is absolutely unacceptable about my experience was the lack of communication. As soon as my order was received I should've been called and informed that there was no Meaty Marinara. As soon as any order hits 45 minutes elapsed there should be a call to inform and reassure the customer that there order is on the way. Really disappointed in the management tonight.

text: Great customer  service and pizza  was great

name: Florence Muhindi
text: I made a delivery order from this location, and the people that work here told me that they couldn’t deliver my order to me because their driver had car problems..... so basically they only have one driver in the whole store so I never got my order

name: Nancy Stephens
text: Order medium pizza with cinnamons sticks to go. Food was good, but when I ordered on the website it told me how many minutes it was going to take to be ready. But no where did it say to call when you arrive in the parking lot. I am only complaining because I have ordered before and my pizza was brought out to me without me calling that I was in the parking lot.

name: Donnie
text:
I ordered a specific pizza from the app, asked while picking up the pizza if it was that pizza, the guy running the register (and by running I mean he was kicked back with headphones in) tells me that it is that pizza.

I go home, discover that it a different pizza, call the store to ask about it, and a woman asks if I ordered from the app. I say yeah and she says they don't even serve that food and I shouldn't have ordered from the app.

The receipt clearly says what it was supposed to be. So instead of just not selling me that pizza, they make me a wrong pizza, charge me for it, and won't give a refund. I'm never using this Pizza Hut again.

Update - I gave this Pizza Hut another chance since I was ordering for my father-in-law and it was the closest one to him. I don't know if it's an app problem or what, but I got the wrong order again. Whoever answered the phone did offer me a refund, but I am definitely ruling this place out. Spent almost 50 bucks the first time, and only 12 this time. Both wrong and not worth the hassle of trying to get the right food. I will just order from the one a few miles away in Helena, which has always been reliable.

text: Pizza is good, but they were not very helpful. My husband ordered a pizza, and it was missing some ingredients. We called, and they didn’t apologize at all. The employee didn’t apologize and the manager didn’t either. They just said you have to bring the pizza back in or we can’t remake it for you. Even though coronavirus is going around, they said it’s company policy to bring the pizza back into the store. I don’t really believe that, and will be emailing the company. We order here frequently, and never had a bad experience until today.

text: Very well organised and convenient place. They serve big meals and for inexpensive prices. We liked the food a lot and the staff members were very friendly and chatty. Will definitely recommend this place.

name: Randall Murphy
text: I remember at a time when Pizza Hut took pride in their pizza. We just ordered pizza and picked it up within 20 minutes after placing the order. Pizza looked and tasted old, was not even cut properly and poorly prepared. I am completely disappointed in the direction this company continues to go down. We basically ate cardboard with a little bit of tomato sauce and a few toppings. Do better Pizza Hut!

name: Patrick Knotts
text:
When the app says 30 to 40 minutes on delivery and your pixza shows up almost two hours later,  there is definitely a customer service disconnect somewhere. Customers understand busy if they are accurately informed.  You have my phone number,  give a courtesy call and you can gain repeat  business. Keep this up and I'll be headed elsewhere for pizza delivery.
****Update - they have improved noticeably. I am giving them more chances especially the rapper.

name: sierra gutierrez
text: So I had ordered a pizza last night from you guys around 9:30ish or so and got it in all great timing but my only issue was your driver first she tried handing me the wrong order and insisted I was wrong & that it was mine for about a few minutes finally after I showed her the receipt online she had made a phone call to a manager to make sure then had finally brought me my food. but all I'm saying you guys should really pay attention to who y'all hire this lady was really high on drugs  or something the way she was acting and moving her jaw was out of control! Very very uncomfortable

text: They can not deliver a pizza to the correct address and by the time I call  and they get someone to my correct address the pizza is cold.  I will never use them again.

I said “Hey how are you?” she didn’t say anything. My order was “ready” on the screen but she told me I had to wait because it wasn’t ready. She just looked like she’d rather be somewhere else. No smiles, etc.

We ordered the BBQ pizza and have been getting it for years. It has always been good but this was dry, hardly any sauce and they forgot the cheese. Worst pizza ever. Pizza Hut has lost my business....it and because it used to be a great pizza place.

Both times this happened they said sorry and didn't offer a refund or to bring another pizza. The bread is always under cooked. At the moment I'm waiting on a order that's 45 minutes late so far. Order from Domino's and you'll be better off.

text: They need a responsible manager yesterday we called from home no answer we drove to pizza as we went we called and no answer... We walked in no one was at front desk!!!! so I called standing in front desk no sound of phone ringing, I looked to the back the guy that had taken our order  and made the  pizza after seen us... had head phones on so didn't even look up for about almost 10 mins... After I told him about the phone calls he started answering the phone and wanted to give me a free coke to compensate, but I didn't take it I could have been home waiting for my pizza to be delivered but that was not going to be possible due untrained irresponsible personal.. this is not the first time not to long ago we called no answer so we drove to pizza hut and the person was seating out side with Jimmy John's employee like nothing was going on laughing.... Like I said they need a manager  a real manager in there!!!

text: Always great service and friendly atmosphere. The Buffalo chicken salad is the best salad I have had in a long while. They will make your chicken as hot as you want it. Great place to watch any sporting event. My new favorite in Mobile.

text: Good food and not to bad of service

name: Jessica Harper
text: The worst experience with a restaurant EVER! When I first come in on my lunch to pick up a call in order there was a young girl that was openly was discussing that she would rather serve dogs than children as they were discussing family night. Someone that PAYS their hard earned money to come in and eat with their children I was instantly disgusted. Then I get back to work and find that my food was undercooked (still bleeding) when I asked for well done. The gentleman that was the manager condoned her remarks as she is just young. Well sir my young children come in there to eat and I am utterly applaud that you stand behind her remarks. I will never spend my money at this restaurant simply because of the manager and the way he handled this situation. So I missed my lunch and had to do without. THANK YOU! Word of mouth is the best compliment, to bad you left me with only negativity.

name: Sam Shorrosh
text: Love the personal visits by the owner who always takes a minute to talk table side. The food is always piping hot and the drinks ice cold. Lots of TVs all around to entertain and the wait staff are helpful without hovering.

name: Cindy Golliher
text: Best wings I have ever had!! Great atmosphere.  Great service. I will definitely stop here the next time I'm in town!

name: Nik Gribb
text: Absolutely the worst service. We decided to go there for some Southern Style food and came away disgusted.  We ordered the fried green tomatoes as an appetizer, got them AFTER our main course was eaten.  Server continually blamed the kitchen staff for the half and hour wait.  The restaurant wasn't even packed.  We ordered corn dogs for the kids, yup half and hour wait.  Server completely forgot the diet coke and screwed up the chicken order.  We asked for legs and thighs, got beast and wing. Argggh.

name: Vernetta Ervin
text: I love this place their wings and loaded fries are the bomb. We also watch the games on one of the many different TV screens they have throughout the place. Great place for sport fans to gather.

name: Shawn Dunne
text: Really good food. I had the jerk wings! Drinks were fine. Beer selection was lacking in the darker Porter style range. The big projectors didn't have great color or clear pictures in the bar area. Overall the pretty decent place.

name: nate J. pooh
text: At the start the service was questionable. We're getting seated and the first table she wanted to seat us at was directly in front on entry way of kitchen. Second spot  was directly next to a couple. Mind you the place was very unpacked maybe 10 guest at best 5 of 10 were at the bar when we got there. The table  had not been wiped clean. The whole area had not been clean since whoever left. It was so slow that the associates were  just standing around talking . The bathroom  looked like a club bathroom on a Saturday night at 2am. Floors were very sticky for some reason. Like when you go to a club and its really hot  and people have wasted alcohol and it's been trampled on. NOW the food was good but the chicken strips and 2 sides was very over price at $13! Three strips fries  and a small  dish  salad. Strips and fries were good tho. I got the Nashville Hot Chicken with two sides.  That was a whole chicken breast and wing for $10 and change. It was very good. Now our waitress was a different story. She was unenthusiastic and very dry. We had completely  ate our food but she had the nerve to ask if we wanted to-go boxes. Um... for the crumbles of curly fries ??? She also didn't check on us till after  we were 80% done eating.

name: Derek Jones
text: Cool venue with plenty of 📺 for whichever sport you prefer. The new Nashville got spice chicken menu is delicious!

name: Maryah Payton
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!! Been going here since I was younger and my favorite are the gooey fries and honey bbq wings! Fast service, good food, nice environment!

name: Michael
text: Meh....I walked in right to place a to-go order for a Nashville hot chicken platter as they were opening for the day. I was told that they didn't have any chicken halves so I had to get the tenders. I took a seat at the end of the bar to wait on my food. The bartender (a very petite brunette) never acknowledged my presence. I would have had a cold beer while I waited to no avail, she was too preoccupied with her cellphone which she had hooked up charging next to the register. (Who shows up for work at 11am and has to charge their phone?) I suppose I may return one day due to the chicken being pretty good but that bartender should understand her personal phone takes a back seat to anyone who sits at the bar. I'm sure she saw me it would have been impossible to miss me. Everyone else was fairly pleasent. Took off 2 stars for not having what I wanted and the unattentive bar keep on duty that day.

name: Dana Williamson
text:
Placed an online order 10/17/18 a little after 5 pm. My husband picked it up and brought it home. The super supreme I ordered was made wrong so we called to have it replaced. My husband went to pick it up and was given yet another pizza that was made incorrectly. When he called back up there the assistant manager Renee on duty argued with my husband telling him that there were not very many olives on the pizza because we had ordered extra toppings and if they put to much they get into trouble. The pizza had no olives at all on it. I called her back and informed her that I did not order extra toppings, only substituted two of the toppings and that there were no olives on the pizza. She continued to argue with me. Made me so angry that I took the pizza back up there and asked for her to show me just one olive on that pizza. She proceeded to tell me there were olives on it when she made it. I told her this is what my husband brought home. I told her how I was treated was wrong and that I would be contacting her general manager and the corporate office.
Update..... Just bit into the third pizza and it has Italian sausage on it.... Of which spurred the original complaint. So still an incorrect pizza.  Three trips for an incorrect order and not even an apology.

text: Last time I will ever go to this place. Called ahead and ordered. Had to wait for almost an hour after getting there for 3 hot n ready pizzas and an order of wings. Again I had called and placed the order in advance and was told 20 minutes. Arrived 30 minutes after placing the order and still had to wait another hour. There was literally at least 30 other people inside and outside waiting also. Got home and it was the WORST food we had ever gotten. A house full of 7 teenage boys and 2 adults and there was still 2 1/2 pizzas left afterwards. The wings were inedible. They looked and tasted like they were made the day before and set out overnight. Horrible...just horrible. Corporate will be getting a major complaint. They were refusing to refund money to those of us that were tired of waiting. The excuse was noone in the store was allowed to refund money and we would have to wait until the next day for the manager to deal with it. This store has gone downhill recently and is a waste of time and money. Never again!!!

name: Cam Mackenzie
text: Terrible. Ordered appetizers that never came, but were delivered as sides instead. The order took forever to actually come out, and two people were missing orders. Drinks were never refilled, and at some point, we resulted to refilling our own, all while some five servers watched us do it. And still didn't refill our waters later until we asked. The food tasted bad. So bad. The chicken was cold and tasted not much unlike what I would imagine to be sweaty playground rubber chips. We normally go to the one in Jones Valley, which is great, but this one was far from it. I'm trying to put it into words, but all I can do is say it's the restaurant equivalent of a very warm and a very soggy salad. We were charged for food we didn't order. Meanwhile, the stool had maybe three tables of people and that's it. All the while, the wait staff stood at the front and talked.

name: S Lee
text: We traveled over an hour to shop in Huntsville only to end up waiting for food we never received for an hour. Out of all the food options in Huntsville we chose BWW and for that we blame ourself. NEVER again. This restaurant is representative of the deserted mall it is housed in. There were tons of servers doing nothing but waiting on the next patron to dart the door and none ever noticed we were not being served. We were two tables away from the host desk and the restaurant was not busy. After the extensive wait and seeing the cooks(I assume) look out the kitchen window, we hit the door. So frustrated we did not even shop. I guess everyone needs to experience the worst service ever and for us this was it! Unbelievable! How are they still in business?

text: Oh man. What a **Itty place. HORRIBLE SERVICE! I am not a complainer,  but this place had me pissed off. I watched 3 different tables of people leave before they even got their drinks. 30 mins later we get our drinks, and 45 minutes after that we get our room temp wings, with hardly any sauce on them. The waitresses looked greasy and disgusting. The manager was incompetent and full of excuses. I WILL NEVER GO BACK. EVER.

text: Ignored the othr reviews, bad idea.  Ordered by phone, get there and the order is wrong (surprise considering the girl on the phone was super short and hungup right away when I was done ordering without repeating).  Waited an extra 10 minutes to get it fixed. I get home and they didn't include any of the sauces that were supposed to come with my sampler ap and there was no sauce on my sandwich.  Not like there was very little sauce, there was almost no sacue at all (the bun was even clean and dry).  Called back and the girl said she was back there when they made the sandwich and there was sauce on it but it must have come off while it was under the heat lamp.  She offered to put me down for a food credit but I'm not from huntsville so that's useless and even if I were why would I want credit for more crappy quality food? There were some solid employees (the femal assistant manager was really nice) but the bad quality control and the lazy employees make this the worst bww I've been to.  Waste of $30.

name: Roy Franks
text: American Deli Inc Is a franchise owned by individuals, so this rating is for the specific  franchisee at the Prattville location. For starters the building is new, so that’s always a plus, unfortunately they cheaped out on the chairs and the backs of them are installed incorrectly. The establishment is nice , and the cashier was friendly. Their CC processor froze while I paid so I had to wait about 10 minutes to pay. The food took about 25 minutes , compared to other locations taking 6-9 minutes. Food wise it’s the same as any other location so the consistency is there. I’m rating 4 stars because it’s a new establishment, I think with proper training this establishment could run as good as the rest of the franchise locations.

resp.text: Thank you for this constructive review! We have improved ten folds since than and also added new delicious items to our menu. Please come by soon and try the new and improved American Deli!

name: Shir Carson
text: Saturday afternoon, 15 -20 min wait, flew by the ambiance in door and outdoor was live. Our server was was great, recommended several items on the menu. We tried the Baked pretzels with queso cheese dip and Honey mustard dip. Ordered the chicken sandwich with french fries and the Brisket and Double burger  with potato wedges. Sprite, water, and Mojito for drinks. the food was served hot, everything was fresh and juicy, seasoned well too! We will be back! Had a great time!

resp.text: Hey Shir. Thanks for the kind words. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Danny Neaves
text: This particular location is great, plenty of parking, some free, some are metered. The facility is top notch and very nice. It is a new facility (as of February 2020) but it goes beyond that it is just a well done space and they stay busy. I've been as early as 11:15 and as late as 12:30 and it is usually very busy. The staff is good and the food is good too. This chain has become a little pricey over the last couple of years, but we enjoy it every time we go. I've been to this location with 3 people and with 6 people and both times we were able to sit quickly even though they were busy. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a quick lunch, they can get you in and out.

text: Wow!!! This BWW is Definitely Struggling!! The hostess was obviously not happy with having to sit us!! He came back and asked me for the signed copy so he could cash out!! My son never got his refill! Never got our fried pickles!! Good luck!! Only working person who was nice or paid attention was the manager wearing the long sleeves who recognized us from Gardendale location!!

name: Hannah Fuller
text: I work in food service so I know some days can be tough, but the lady working to-go with the long blue nails was the rudest ever!! I tried to call and place a to go order and I couldn’t even stand to continue speaking with her using that tone. Then I go in to order takeout inside and she acted like it was so irritating that I was even there. I tried to compliment her to maybe brighten her mood but she still spoke with me with an attitude. Then after I paid 3 dollars for a lemonade, she brought me what tasted like water with some drops of lemon juice in it. I want my refund for my drink!!! I went there a year ago and had bugs in my food. I should’ve learned then not to come back!

resp.text: Hey Hannah. We apologize. Please share additional details with us at the link below. A member of our Guest Support Team will reach out to you to make it right. name: Trey Lykens
text: I go here quite often and get lunch. Awesome service and the food is always amazing. Whether  we go in and sit down to eat or order to-go, food is always phenomenal and always exactly what I order.

resp.text: Hey Trey. Thanks for the feedback! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Hello Terry
text: I ordered my lunch online and went straight to the restaurant about 5 minutes away by car.  The staff was pleasant.  I paid for my food and waited in the van for my co-worker to pay for his food.  As I waited I looked into my bag to inspect my lunch and eat a few fries.  The fries were hard and lukewarm at best.  I go back in and ask for fresher fries which they obliged by taking my entire lunch back and putting the "fresh fries" in my clamshell.  After returning to the office to eat; the parmesan garlic chicken nuggets were obviously not fried to order.  They were dry and barely warm as well.  Every time I've gone to BWW this has been the case whether dining in or carry out.  I think they cook everything in bulk and its never fresh or hot when it reaches the table.  In my dine-in experiences bone-in wings are never cooked to order and always seem like they're been sitting under a heat lamp and brought out to the table.  I will not go to another BWW again; food is just not done right and is never good!!

resp.text: Hey there. We apologize for the food you received…thanks for letting us know. Please fill out the form at the bottom of BuffaloWildWings.com/FAQ where it says 'Orders & Visits' so we can make it right for you.

name: TaNeiqua Jackso
text: The absolute worst chicken I've ever eaten, I ordered ahead and the food had to be brought to the pickup area, the room was ten minutes away from BWW so there shouldn't have been a reason for it to be cold as though it had been sitting out for hours. The chicken had so many feathers, I couldn't even enjoy . I ordered kids meals for my girls both of which were supposed to have a drink that we didn't receive, and also their order was completely wrong,  the whole order was wrong  actually and the taste of the food was mediocre at best, that was the first and last time for me and my family. And when I tried calling no one answered the phone, it was already late and I was upset, we basically ate fries for dinner . if I could rate it a Zero I really would. But I'll just do one better and not give them my money at all.

resp.text: Hey there. Thanks for letting us know about this, we are very sorry. Please fill out the form at the bottom of BuffaloWildWings.com/FAQ where it says 'Orders & Visits' if you don’t mind so we can make it right for you.

name: Bernadine Birdsong
text: Our server told us she was training a new girl. She took our order and promptly disappeared. She never came back to check on us. Someone else brought our food. Our fries were cold. That young man took them back and returned later with fresh fries and also refreshed my daughter's drink.  We finished our meal and started stacking the dishes before the trainee arrived to ask if we wanted dessert. We decided to just pay and leave.  We never saw our original server again.  The place is brand new. Very nice sports bar atmosphere. Everyone else seemed friendly. I just think we had the wrong server.  I will go back again to try another server.

The manager was nice did apologize several times and did provide compensation.   Since this is a relatively new establishment,  hopefully it will get better with time.

text: Food is always top notch. The service today was not top notch. Asked for coffee with dessert and was told that they didn't have any made. When asked about making a pot the server balked and said, "I guess I can." We declined the offer.

name: Kelsey
text: 11 of us went for lunch to celebrate a coworker's birthday. We ordered and waited almost an hour for food. The server started out good refilling drinks but that really only happened once. It took effort to find out why the orders were taking so long considering we arrived before the lunch rush. The food finally arrived and wrong. I ordered a black bean burger. The only correct thing about it was the patty. Instead of the cheddar and ranch advertised on the menu, the burger was slathered with mustard. It also had lettuce, tomato, mayo, and pickles. I'd have requested no pickles had I been aware it's come dressed differently than advertised. The restaurant is nice. The potato wedges were good. The lack of service and an incorrect order when it could've come as advertised is baffling. If you visit, be prepared for a lengthy wait. Beverages will come but everything else may be a battle.

text: My first experience was terrible. I was helped fast and got out fast but my order was wrong (even though the entire restaurant was dead). I went back in a few weeks later and after speaking with a manager to get my credit, they were able to rectify the situation and it was a great experience. I will be back and I'm glad to know they care about fixing their mistakes.

name: Jasmine Daniels
text: Do not eat from this store!!! I had 3 call in orders for wings from here Tuesday night. The wings were not cooked all the way. The wings made my brother, cousin, my boyfriend, and I sick on the stomach. My brother woke me up at 2 a.m. from puking so loud! I called the manager on today and was nice about telling him what all happened. He responded by telling me that they cook their wings all the way and that there is no way possible we got sick from THEIR food! He stated that “If you all were food poisoned you all would still be throwing up today and it usually takes 24 hr to get it”. So they have doctors on site now? My family and I hadn't eaten anything since the morning of before eating there last night around 7:20 p.m. Once your stomach digest your food, if it doesn’t agree with what you’re putting in it it is going to come out one way or the other! It doesn’t take 24 hours for your food to digest! My brother did not eat all day today. The manager was rude and that is not great customer service. They just opened this store and this was my first time eating here last night. I see Why I don’t now. BUFFALO WILD WINGS will never get another PENNY from me, but y’all enjoy!!

resp.text: Hey Jasmine.  We are very sorry about the poor experience you had.  Please give us a call at 866-704-0777.

name: ALBERT THOR HARSTVEDT
text:
Atmosphere and food was great. Restaurant very clean. However, I've had better service at Waffle House. Our food was brought out pretty quickly. I had to get up and go get us both silverware and napkins. Server (Jania) never brought us any till I got up to go find another server to all for them. Jania did bring me a refill on my drink but not my son's water. What really got me was that Jania (our server) never took our dirty plates of the table. She brought the check, came back a few minutes later to process the pmt, brought it back again...but NEVER picked Any of our plates off of our table. Please train your wait staff to serve the guests that they are waiting on. My son paid the tab and still left over 20% gratuity. We hungout for a while after paying the tab to visit, but Jania never came back to remove our dirty plates. Yes, I'm going on about for a bit. Any restaurant establishment is only as good as thepeople that work for them. Be it a mom and pop owned restaurant or a 4-5 star establishment. Will I come back to this location...No, not now. Minimal expectations walking in....less than minimal results except for the quality of the food and atmosphere. Too bad as the cost of the owners investment in this location looks pretty expensive. Have a great day...
Guest

name: Daniel Bolding
text: Great new addition to downtown Birmingham! It is conveniently located by the UAB campus and Regions Field where the Birmingham Barons play. I watched the first Birmingham Irons game there on the projector screen that was above the bar, and it was awesome! Great bartenders that remember your face and even your orders! I love going on Thursdays for the buy one get one free boneless wing days. My favorite sauces are Mango Habanero, Hot BBQ, Hot Buffalo, and Asian Zing. The new Bourbon Honey Mustard is great too, but the former sauces are hotter and better to me since I love spicy foods. Most BWW have been subpar recently, but this one is great!

text: Pizza was hot and delicious.  It is getting pretty bad though when they get too cheap to give their customers parmesan cheese packs. Also, a delivery fee should be for the driver. If you don't physically deliver the food, the fees shouldn't be going to your pocket.

name: Holt Hargett
text: Called ordered 4 pizzas they apparently made 3 of them put them sitting to the side and said the 4th was coming it never did.. by the time they realized it my other 3 had already been sitting out on the counter 30 mins and was cold did not even attempt to store in the warmer.. there solution was to offer me a full refund(debit card could take 2 days to return to account) and me have to find food somewhere else and wait more or wait to remake all 4 pizzas together.. 1hr 45 mins later I left with my food!! While sitting there they also handed out another person's whole order to another customer so he had to wait for remake as well!! NOPE!! NOT ever again!!

name: Gary Kendrick
text:
Pizza Hut provides very good pizza and gives you great choices, as well as their wings are also good.  Some of their policies do, however, tend to make me question the thinking behind them.

The most recent one is doing away with the complimentary parmesan cheese packs making the customer pay for a small parmesan cheese shaker for a dollar if they want the parmesan cheese to go on top of their Pizza.

I also have a problem with chain pizza restaurants, like most of the main players in the chain pizza restaurants that charge a delivery fee for delivery yet that fee is not going to the drivers at all.  Pizza Hut, like many of the other major players seems to be doing away with their eat-in restaurants meaning you either have to carry it out or get it delivered so if that's going to be your main business you shouldn't be charging people extra for it making customers think the extra fee goes to the drivers because it doesn't.

If you're going to charge a fee for delivery then pass it along to your drivers and don't just add it to your bottom line.  I do like Pizza Hut pizzas but there are other places, in our area that I do like better.  I keep coming back to Pizza Hut because it's consistent, it's good, and when you crave Pizza Hut no other place will do.  Of the large pizza chain restaurants I do believe Pizza Hut delivers are provides the best product overall in their coupon specials are also good.

Ironically Marco’s Pizza and Papa John’s Pizza will deliver to Saddlebrook even though they are further away. Unfortunately the management of the Killen Pizza Hut has gone downhill recently  and the service has suffered. I do not recommend this location of Pizza Hut to anyone !

I can guarantee they wouldn't last a month if any other pizza place were to open in the area.

name: Mrs. Sterling
text: The ONLY reason I am rewarding 4 stars is because the fried shrimp taste and have the texture of Chinese Buffet shrimp.  The wings are bit more than average but nothing major to brag about, but I'd order them again.  The catfish on the other hand is amazing and the french fries are the best.  However, I am extremely partial to seasoned crinkle fries so don't take my word for it.  The staff didn't seem too friendly upon arrival but they did eventually warm-up, we assume it's because they are young and the business was still fairly new.  WTBS, I wouldn't turn anyone away from this establishment, I'd more so encourage them to give it a try and make their decision from there.  Also, this is the FIRST establishment in Montgomery, AL that has syrup-based Lemonade that isn't extremely sweet, which makes your throat scratchy, or overly tart which makes for a horrible "drink" experience.  Give JJ Seafood and Wings a try, we did and we will be return.......... at least for the catfish and fries :).
